short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Configurate YouTube's (unwanted) behaviours with functions not listed in the settings page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to disable certain YouTube behaviors. With the current version you'll be able to turn off the likes of Shorts and the End Cards.
